programme.desc: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space, S01E02, A recovered Doctor escapes the hospital and joins UNIT in their investigation. Meanwhile, Channing directs one of his Auton servants to recover a meteorite.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space, S01E03, Sam Seeley has found one of the meteorites but the Autons want it back and are closing in. General Scobie visits Auto Plastics, playing into the hands of Channing.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space, S01E04, The invasion begins as Auton shop dummies come to life and attack the public. The Doctor and UNIT infiltrate Auto Plastics where the Doctor faces the Nestene consciousness.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E01, UNIT is at a project run by Professor Stahlman who intends to penetrate Earth’s crust. But the drilling has already released something deadly from beneath the Earth’s surface.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E02, The green slime oozing from the drill head is transforming men into monsters. Stahlman refuses to listen to the warnings and resorts to sabotage so that his project may continue.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E03, Transported to a parallel world, the Doctor discovers that England is under military rule and the drilling project is at a more advanced stage.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E04, In the parallel world, the drilling project is about to penetrate the Earth’s crust. The Doctor, arrested as a spy, is unable to convince his captors of the danger that faces them.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E05, In the parallel world, Earth’s crust has been penetrated, releasing terrible forces from within the Earth. The Doctor must escape back to his world to prevent the same catastrophe.

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Inferno, S01E06, As the Earth in the parallel world faces destruction, the Doctor is desperate to return to his world to warn them of the danger. But time is running out.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E09, On a summer night in 1987, a 17-year-old girl to come home is found raped and strangled near the Hudson River. And In 1983, a young mother is raped and murdered at work. The crime remains unsolved for two decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E21, In June 1985, a 20-year-old "Sucker Day" Festival Queen is found brutalized. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is on the hands of a local wealthy businessman, but after 25 years DNA reveals the true killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Officer Down
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E06, The longest-running cold case of a law enforcement officer in the United States was the murder of Sheriff's Lt. Joe Clark.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

MST3K: Escape 2000, 19960302000000 +0000, A grunge punk fights an evil corporation enforcing an evacuation of the Bronx in Escape from the Bronx (1983). Mike and the Bots have "Men's Night" on the SOL and Dr. Forester tries to come up with a way to boost the show's ratings.

programme.title: Warrior Of The Lost World
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior Of The Lost World, S06E01, A nameless hero and his talking motorcycle fight an evil dictator in a post-apocalyptic world.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.

programme.title: Crash of the Moons
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Crash of the Moons, S04E24, The crew pokes fun at another segment of a 1960s episode of General Hospital (1963) before watching an astronaut attempt to stop two planets from colliding with each other in Crash of the Moons.

programme.title: The Starfighters
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Starfighters, S06E12, An Air Force pilot attempts to gain the respect of his father.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.

programme.title: Future War
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E04, Future War was the most recent film ridiculed by the Satellite of Love crew, proving once and for all that movies aren’t always turned bad by age.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: Backlot: The History Of MST3K, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E49, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

programme.title: Girl in Gold Boots
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E02, A girl from rural California goes to Los Angeles to work as a go-go dancer, but soon gets involved with drug dealers.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.
MST3K: Beyond Atlantis, 20220508000000 +0000, A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).

Breathing Lessons, 19940206000000 +0000, A mature couple, one grounded and realistic and the other flighty and inspired, get lost on a trip that becomes a crazy adventure of twists, turns, shocks and surprises rekindling memories, love and life.

The Wedding March, 20160625000000 +0000, After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man. Stars Jack Wagner, Emily Tennant and Josie Bissett.

When Sparks Fly, 20140628000000 +0000, Fireworks go off when Amy Peterson comes home to help save her family's annual 4th of July celebration and discovers she loves the man she left behind years ago to pursue her dreams of becoming a journalist. Stars Meghan Markle.

The Memory Book, 20140726000000 +0000, At a flea market, Chloe discovers a book of photos showcasing the romance of a young couple from the early seventies. She sets out on a literal and emotional journey to find the happy couple she knows only through photos.

Sweet Nothing in My Ear, 20080420000000 +0000, Dan and Laura Miller have been married for several years, but their relationship begins to change when their only son, Adam, loses his hearing at the age of four.

So You Said Yes, 20150207000000 +0000, A woman who avoids relationships opens a vintage bridal shop, and goes head-to-head with the snobbish owner of the town's classical bridal shop-only to find out her rival is the mother of her new boyfriend.

Riding the Bus With My Sister, 20050501000000 +0000, A photographer and her developmentally challenged sister begin living together when their father dies. Stars Andie MacDowell and Rosie O'Donnell. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
One Starry Christmas, 20141101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Holly can't wait to go back to New York City this Christmas.

Christmas in Conway, 20131201000000 +0000, Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Harmony
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E14, Wanting to maintain diplomatic relations, Sheppard and McKay accompany Harmony, a precocious young princess, on a mandatory rite of passage. However, they are unaware that she has enemies, and character flaws, yet to be dealt with.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E15, When Lt. Colonel John Sheppard receives word that his father has passed away he returns to Earth. But once there, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous experiment gone awry—a human form Replicator now on the loose that must be recaptured at all cost.

programme.title: Trio
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E16, During an off-world mission in a village rocked by fierce tremors, Col. Samantha Carter, Dr. McKay, and Dr. Keller become trapped when they fall into a sinkhole. But every attempt to escape the confines of the chamber puts them in further jeopardy.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E13, Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E05, SG-1 struggles to control a rash of brutal attacks by an elusive and savage alien creature. Starring Ben Browder as Lt. Col. Mitchell, Amanda Tapping as Lt. Col. Carter, Christopher Judge as Teal'c, and Michael Shanks as Dr. Jackson.

Stargate SG-1, S10E06, A reluctant SG-1 assists Martin Lloyd (guest star Willie Garson) with his feature film script as a cover story to keep the Stargate Program secret. Also starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Counterstrike
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E07, When the Jaffa modify an Ancient device so that it is capable of defeating the Ori, Adria (Morena Baccarin) leads an attack on Dakara. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Memento Mori
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E08, When Vala (Claudia Black) is kidnapped by Trust members acting under the orders of the Goa'uld Athena, an accident causes her to lose all memory of who she is and where she came from. Also starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Company Of Thieves
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E09, Lt. Col. Cameron Mitchell (Ben Browder) goes undercover to track down the Odyssey, which SG-1 believes was hijacked by the Lucian Alliance. Also starring Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Quest (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E10, SG-1 finds the planet where they believe the Sangraal is. Forced to forge temporary alliances with Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) they undertake a quest to find it. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Quest, The: Part II
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E11, Discovering the frozen body of Merlin (guest star Matthew Walker), SG-1 works to help him build the Sangraal before Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and her Ori army can track them down. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Line In The Sand
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E12, Hoping to use Merlin's phasing device to hide a village from the Ori army, something goes wrong forcing Mitchell (Ben Browder) and a critically injured Carter (Amanda Tapping) to hide themselves out of phase from an occupation of Ori soldiers.

programme.title: The Road Not Taken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E13, An experiment goes wrong leaving Lt. Colonel Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) trapped in a parallel reality where martial law has been enforced and Earth is under attack from the Ori. Also starring Ben Browder, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Shroud
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E14, When Daniel Jackson turns up as a Prior asking SG-1 to aid him in a plan that might very well be a trap, it's up to Maj. Gen. Jack O'Neill and the team to not only save Jackson's life, but possibly end the war with the Ori once and for all.

programme.title: And Don't Forget to Give Me Back My Black T-Shirt
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E23, Mitch annoys Donna by trying to plan their entire relationship via an electronic organizer. Janet nixes Steve's plans to invest in Donna's site because of their limited finances.

programme.title: Love Is Blind
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E24, Dylan's generous wedding gift vexes Kelly and Matt, who consider moving to Seattle; an offer for their tabloid separates the Sanders' professionally; Noah meets Ellen's family; Donna's mother sells her house.

programme.title: The Penultimate
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E26, David expresses his feelings for Donna by writing her a giant love note in the sand. Dylan graduates from California University. Matt considers moving to New York to help his sister-in-law raise her child.

programme.title: Ode to Joy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E27, After 10 years, the friends of 90210 say goodbye with a wedding, a reunion, and a few surprises! Just as Donna and David are joining together, Kelly's life is falling apart. Meanwhile, Steve and Janet make some major decisions about their future.

programme.title: Pilot Parts 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E001, Twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh experience a very special kind of culture shock when they move from Minnesota to Beverly Hills and begin their new lives at West Beverly High.

programme.title: The Green Room
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E002, Brandon meets Dylan McKay, a brooding classmate. As they become friends, Brandon learns that Dylan's bad-boy act masks a hidden life that few people ever see.

programme.title: Every Dream Has Its Price
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E003, Brenda shops with Kelly and Tiffany and wishes she had their kind of money.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E004, Brandon is visited by his ex-girlfriend Sheryl but, when she meets Dylan, she's quickly star-struck by his money and glamor.

programme.title: One on One
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E005, When Brandon tries out for the basketball team, he's angered to learn that his main rival is from another district.

programme.title: Higher Education
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E006, An unreasonable teacher makes Brandon's life miserable by giving him no grade higher than a C.

programme.title: Perfect Mom
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E007, "Delusions of glamour" overcome Brenda when she meets Kelly's beautiful mother Jackie, a former model.

programme.title: Seventeen Year Itch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E008, The Walsh parents examine their relationship while Brenda and Brandon examine theirs, as they get involved in a UCLA study on twins.

programme.title: The Gentle Art Of Listening
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E009, Sympathy and responsibility are at odds when Brenda volunteers for a teen crisis hotline.

programme.title: Isn't It Romantic?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E010, The chemistry between Brenda and Dylan starts to heat up when Brenda accidentally catches him in the shower, then comforts him after he fights with his father.

programme.title: B.Y.O.B.
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E011, Both Walsh twins face the temptation to drink alcohol when their peers are doing it all around them.

programme.title: One Man and a Baby

programme.title: Maui Xterra
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E19, Jessie tries to overcome her condition to compete in the Maui triathlon with Dawn as her coach. Allie suspects an agenda behind Dawn's motives. Jason and Kekoa seek a mysterious underwater Hawaiian spirit that lures people to their deaths.

programme.title: Baywatch Ohana
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E20, Sean tries to keep his relationship with Jenna a secret. When the team has to rescue swimmers trapped in a filtration tube, Jenna is sucked down a shaft and Sean risks everything to save her, revealing his darkest secret.

programme.title: The Last Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E21, No longer able to cope with his guilt of surviving the attack on Pearl Harbor, Jessie's grandfather comes to Hawaii to end his life. Can Mitch intervene in time? Kekoa and Sean help a college basketball player learn to swim.

programme.title: The Killing Machine
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E22, Mitch goes undercover to stop an ex-Navy SEAL turned eco-terrorist from detonating a deadly underwater explosive device. When Mitch's dive gear floats to the surface, Sean and the team fear the worst.

programme.title: Soul Survivor
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E01, Sean clashes with Jenna. A new love triangle emerges between new recruit Zack and rookie hopeful Carrie, who’s more interested in Jason. Sean and new lifeguard Leigh Dwyer confront daredevil Cliff, whose dangerous antics disrupt the Baywatch team.

programme.title: Knife in the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E02, A teenager's waverunner causes accidents and his father threatens to sue Baywatch for not rescuing him ahead of his victims. JD takes out his personal problems on Sean. Zack relentlessly pursues Carrie while she pursues Jason.

programme.title: Bad Boyz
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E03, Sean and Jenna clash when she tries to close Baywatch so investors can develop the property. Carrie is afraid she's not lifeguard material after her reluctance to jump into the water from a hovering helicopter.

programme.title: Dangerous Games
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E04, Leigh goes hang gliding with Sam Parks, a daredevil pilot who puts her life in danger. Things go horribly wrong when Kekoa's cousin, Nani, parties on a boat with drunken frat boys and ends up alone in the ocean.

programme.title: Stone Cold
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E05, A plane carrying a donor's heart crashes, and it’s up to Jason to make a desperate dive to retrieve the heart before the patient dies. Two hooligans steal a car and end up trapped underwater. Jenna tries to get Leigh to turn against Sean.

programme.title: Broken Promises
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E06, To avoid jail, Danny joins Team Baywatch. Leigh doesn't trust him. Kekoa battles her father over her lifeguard career and moves out. JD, Zack, and Jason hustle two gorgeous women who turn out to be con artists who turn the tables on them.

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E07, Jenna convinces ruthless Councilman McKenna to close the Training Center. Sean suspends Zack after he severely injures JD during a rescue. Kekoa expresses her deep love for JD – but to Leigh! Zack sees a ghostly woman from his dreams.

programme.title: The Cage
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E08, Sean confronts a "shark tour" operator dangerously dumping chum to lure sharks. A tourist who wants to be a hero to impress his son keeps interfering with Jason's rescues. JD and Kekoa try to keep their passionate relationship a secret.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E09, Sean's incredible guilt after a surfing accident leads to a crisis of faith. Zack has to choose between loyalty to his Baywatch teammates and his competitive ambitions.

programme.title: Ties that Bind
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E10, Zack is devastated when Sean promotes Carrie instead of him. Zack and Jason befriend a man and his teenage daughter who harbor a dangerous secret. Zack supplies a boat to escape to Maui, but disaster strikes before they get there.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E11, Leigh suspects Sasha, an attractive tourist, of murdering her husband. Betraying Leigh, Jason seduces Sasha with shocking results! Sean is shocked when he discovers the truth about his ex-wife's visit to Hawaii.

programme.title: Ex-Files
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E12, A series of fake rescue calls puts Sean, Jenna and Zack’s lives in danger. Jenna replaces Councilman McKenna, giving her the power to shut down the Training Center! JD tries to get Kekoa’s father to bless their relationship.

programme.title: The Stalker
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E13, Carrie rescues a spearfisherman who starts obsessively stalking her. Sean, Jason, and Zack save her from his deadly pursuit, but can Carrie feel safe saving strangers again? Sean is jealous of Sam dating Leigh, but Leigh has doubts about Sam.
